title: CAN'T EVEN PICK A CHAMPION ON THE NEW CLIENT.. HEEELP
body:
Hey guys I'm having some issues with the new client, everytime I get to champion select... I cant see any champions to pick on the screen 
so I cant play, do you know anything about this issue?

replies.body: Those missing champions happen mostly when your network is having a hard time talking with our servers for some reason. Let's go through [**these steps **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure that we're hitting all the most common solutions for these kinds of issues.
